results.name: a(n) = A003961(n) - n, where A003961 is the prime shift towards larger primes.
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..16384
Antti Karttunen, Data supplement: n, a(n) computed for n = 1..65537
Index entries for sequences computed from indices in prime factorization
Index entries for sequences related to sigma(n)
program: (PARI) A336853(n) = { my(f = factor(n)); for(i=1, #f~, f[i, 1] = nextprime(f[i, 1]+1)); (factorback(f)-n); };
xref: Cf. A000035, A001359 (positions of 2's), A003961, A252748, A336852 (inverse Möbius transform).
results.author: _Antti Karttunen_, Aug 09 2020
